exec git init
exec git config user.email i@example.com
exec git config user.name someone

exec git add file
rm file

exec git status --porcelain --branch 
stdout '## No commits yet on .+\nAD file'

gitstatus
stdout '&{Porcelain:{NumModified:1 NumConflicts:0 NumUntracked:0 NumStaged:0 IsDetached:false IsInitial:true LocalBranch:master RemoteBranch: AheadCount:0 BehindCount:0} NumStashed:0 HEAD: State:Default IsClean:false}'
! stderr .

-- file --
line1
line2
